name: Home Of Zombie Jill(hq residential house game jam)
name_original: Home Of Zombie Jill(hq residential house game jam)
description:
This game is made for hq residential house game jam.

If there is a asset that has been used as much as hq residential house it is the girl in hospital gown a.k.a Zombie Jill.  So here im giving you the chance to put both hq residential house and Zombie Jill to rest.  

I built the game on same code as Five Steps From Hell, so if you have played my other stuff you will feel right at home!
